languages.text: "Инфернус-мастер, раз вы так печетесь об этих сиротах, теперь они — ваш клан. Разъясните им, за что сражались и гибли их родители".
"Infernus Master, since you are so concerned about the orphans, they are henceforth your clan. It falls to you to teach them the meaning of what their parents fought and died for."
languages.original_text: "Инфернус-мастер, раз вы так печетесь об этих сиротах, теперь они — ваш клан. Разъясните им, за что сражались и гибли их родители".

traits.locale_text: "Infernus Master, since you are so concerned about the orphans, they are henceforth your clan. It falls to you to teach them the meaning of what their parents fought and died for."
"Infernus Master, since you are so concerned about the orphans, they are henceforth your clan. It falls to you to teach them the meaning of what their parents fought and died for."

"Infernus Master, since you are so concerned about the orphans, they are henceforth your clan. It falls to you to teach them the meaning of what their parents fought and died for."

languages.text: "Infernus-Meister, nachdem Ihr Euch so sehr um die Waisen sorgt, sind sie fortan Euer Clan. Lehrt sie die Bedeutung dessen, wofür ihre Eltern gekämpft haben und gestorben sind."
languages.original_text: "Infernus Master, since you are so concerned about the orphans, they are henceforth your clan. It falls to you to teach them the meaning of what their parents fought and died for."

traits.locale_text: "Infernus-Meister, nachdem Ihr Euch so sehr um die Waisen sorgt, sind sie fortan Euer Clan. Lehrt sie die Bedeutung dessen, wofür ihre Eltern gekämpft haben und gestorben sind."

languages.text: « Maître-infernus, puisque vous vous souciez tant du sort de ces orphelins, ils vont dès à présent intégrer votre clan. À vous de leur apprendre pourquoi leurs parents se sont battus jusqu'à la mort. »
languages.original_text: "Infernus Master, since you are so concerned about the orphans, they are henceforth your clan. It falls to you to teach them the meaning of what their parents fought and died for."

traits.locale_text: « Maître-infernus, puisque vous vous souciez tant du sort de ces orphelins, ils vont dès à présent intégrer votre clan. À vous de leur apprendre pourquoi leurs parents se sont battus jusqu'à la mort. »

languages.text: «Maestro de infernus, puesto que tanto le preocupan los huérfanos, los encomiendo a su clan. Le corresponde a usted enseñarles por qué lucharon y murieron sus padres».
languages.original_text: "Infernus Master, since you are so concerned about the orphans, they are henceforth your clan. It falls to you to teach them the meaning of what their parents fought and died for."

traits.locale_text: «Maestro de infernus, puesto que tanto le preocupan los huérfanos, los encomiendo a su clan. Le corresponde a usted enseñarles por qué lucharon y murieron sus padres».

languages.text: 「インフェルヌス・マスター、お前がそんなにも孤児たちを心配しているからには、これより先、彼らをお前の一族としよう。その子らの両親が何のために戦い、死んでいったのか。その意味を教えるのがお前の役目だ」
languages.original_text: "Infernus Master, since you are so concerned about the orphans, they are henceforth your clan. It falls to you to teach them the meaning of what their parents fought and died for."

traits.locale_text: 「インフェルヌス・マスター、お前がそんなにも孤児たちを心配しているからには、これより先、彼らをお前の一族としよう。その子らの両親が何のために戦い、死んでいったのか。その意味を教えるのがお前の役目だ」

languages.text: “控火大师，既然你这么关心这些孤儿，他们以后就是你的氏族成员了。你要肩负起教导他们的责任，让他们明白他们父母战斗、牺牲的意义。”
languages.original_text: "Infernus Master, since you are so concerned about the orphans, they are henceforth your clan. It falls to you to teach them the meaning of what their parents fought and died for."

traits.locale_text: “控火大师，既然你这么关心这些孤儿，他们以后就是你的氏族成员了。你要肩负起教导他们的责任，让他们明白他们父母战斗、牺牲的意义。”

languages.text: "İtfa Üstadı, madem yetimlerle bu kadar ilgileniyorsun... Bundan böyle onları klanının mensubu kılıyorum. Onlara ebeveynlerinin ne uğruna savaşıp öldüklerini öğretmek artık senin vazifen."
languages.original_text: "Infernus Master, since you are so concerned about the orphans, they are henceforth your clan. It falls to you to teach them the meaning of what their parents fought and died for."
